item.title: cucumber set up
item.description: I recently wrote an integration test framework for a kafka pipeline using cucumber and testcontainers. This is part 1 of a series explaining how, starting with setting up our project to be able to run cucumber tests from maven & our IDE (IntelliJ in my case). why cucumber? I’d previously written a couple of integration test frameworks triggered from JUnit Jupiter @Test methods. These both used fluent APIs to set up the required environment & execute the test, hiding the plumbing from the test author.
